price: Ama mtu anapo jaribiwa na Mola wake Mlezi, akamkirimu na akamneemesha, husema: Mola wangu Mlezi amenikirimu!
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ
footnotes: Ama mtu akijaribiwa na Mola wake Mlezi na akamkirimu, na akamneemesha kwa mali na cheo na nguvu, basi husema kwa kughurika na hayo: Mola wangu Mlezi amenitukuza kwa kuwa ninastahiki haya!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā al-insānu idhā mā ib'talāhu rabbuhu fa-akramahu wanaʿʿamahu fayaqūlu rabbī akramani
